title: Enough champions?
body: Am I the only one who, due to the huge amount of champs in the game, has actually forgotten the existence of certain older (and even not that old) champions? With the roster LoL has now, it seems like they could stop producing new champions and just rework old ones and have their work cut out for themselves for a loooong time.

replies.body: there will never be enough champs, even on its death bed, LoL will still put out new champs
i often forget that taliyah exists

> [{quoted}](name=Melvear,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=elc76F9v,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-03-03T05:26:54.873+0000)
>
> Am I the only one who, due to the huge amount of champs in the game, has actually forgotten the existence of certain older (and even not that old) champions? With the roster LoL has now, it seems like they could stop producing new champions and just rework old ones and have their work cut out for themselves for a loooong time.

Yes you are the only one.
